description: Bremen is the last of Germany's 16 states to require using face masks on public transport.
title: Coronavirus: Germany's states make face masks compulsory
title_page: Coronavirus: Germany's states make face masks compulsory - BBC News
maintext: Rhineland-Palatinate in the south-west says pupils will be given reusable masks as they slowly start to return to school at the beginning of May, while in Bavaria masks are mandatory for everyone aged seven and over from Monday.
